item.title: Basic Shiny Example: A survey using filters
item.description: Today at our R-Ladies meeting, a new R user wanted to know if R could be a platform to help people pick an insurance strategy based on some basic demographic data. We werenâ€™t sure either, so we tried to see if we could make a simple working example of the sort of thing she envisioned. This is what we developed. You can download the dummy data here and see the app in action here.
